definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
cotyledon of a bean (i.e. either of the halves of a bean seed that can be split apart after removing the seed coat)/thick bean sauce (abbr. for 豆瓣醬|豆瓣酱[dou4 ban4 jiang4])
cotyledon of a bean (i.e. either of the halves of a bean seed that can be split apart after removing the seed coat)/thick bean sauce (abbr. for 豆瓣醬|豆瓣酱[dou4 ban4 jiang4])
(bird species of China) red phalarope (Phalaropus fulicarius)

sentences.english: How many cusps are there supposed to be on this pulmonic valve.
sentences.chinese: 你認爲這個肺動脈瓣有多少個瓣葉？

sentences.english: BACKGROUND To observe the therapeutic effects of transplantation of conjunctival flap for pterygium.
sentences.chinese: 觀察單純結膜瓣移植治療翼狀胬肉的療效。

sentences.english: Bi-pedicle muscular flap were used to reconstruct the larynx.
sentences.chinese: 殘喉創面修復用雙蒂肌軟骨膜瓣重建喉功能。

sentences.english: The recipient bladder and donor bladder patch were then anastomosed.
sentences.chinese: 供體膀胱瓣與受體膀胱全層縫合。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effect of deep venous insufficiency and its complications in lower limb.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結下肢深靜脈瓣功能不全及併發症的治療體會。

sentences.english: In fact it is very rare to find a four-leaf clover.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，四個瓣的三葉草是非常罕見的。

sentences.english: Calcification is the main cause of bioprosthetic heart valve failure.
sentences.chinese: 鈣化是生物瓣原發性失功的主要原因。

sentences.english: The waiter brought us a dish of orange segments.
sentences.chinese: 服務員給我們端來一盤掰開的橘子瓣。

sentences.english: One of the two silicified halves of the cell wall of a diatom.
sentences.chinese: 瓣硅藻的兩片硅化的細胞壁之一。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate effects of repairing incomplete cleft palate with double island mucoperiosteal flap.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索雙島粘骨膜瓣修復不完全性齶裂的效果。

sentences.english: Free flap transfer is being increasingly used for DCIS.
sentences.chinese: DCIS已越來越多地採用遊離瓣轉移。

sentences.english: The level of valve lift check valve should be installed in horizontal pipelines.
sentences.chinese: 升降式水平瓣止回閥應安裝在水平管道上。

sentences.english: Objective To offer anatomic parameters for diagnosing and treating the diseases about right atrioventricular valve.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲心臟右房室瓣病變的臨牀診治提供解剖學資料。

sentences.english: Once the drilling is complete, the shape of the round holes are modified by a milling operation which increases the valved area.
sentences.chinese: 一旦鑽探完成，該圓孔形狀修改碎行動瓣面積增加。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of repairing damaged dura mater by use of pedicled temporalis fascial flap.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結帶蒂顳肌筋膜瓣修補硬腦膜缺損的應用經驗。

sentences.english: Semidouble dark lavender star/ dark orchid sparkle edge.
sentences.chinese: 半重瓣星形花，較暗的淡紫色鑲有暗蘭色寬邊。
